Create a DIY home gym: You can create a small gym in your home using common household items such as resistance bands, bodyweight exercises, and weights made from objects like milk jugs or water bottles.
Join a virtual fitness class: With the rise of online fitness classes, you can participate in a virtual workout session from the comfort of your own home.
Take up a new outdoor activity: Try something new like hiking, biking, or swimming in the open water.
Incorporate movement into your daily routine: Find ways to add more physical activity into your day, such as taking the stairs instead of the elevator or doing a quick stretching routine before bed.
Find a workout buddy: Find a friend or family member who is also looking to stay active and fit, and create a workout routine together.
